answers.answer: I always have fears of having a miscarriage/stillborn. I happened to have moved basically to the middle of nowhere a few months before I got pregnant. I am wanting a home birth like I did with my first 2, but being 45 minutes away from a hospital if something were to go wrong really scares me. It also scares me that I live 2 hours away from my midwife (2 1/2 in traffic) so even if I wanted to have the baby at the birth center, I may not make it. My husband works 30-40 minutes away, then you think about getting kids ready and loaded and animals taken care of. On top of that, my first labor was 3hrs and 51mins from start to finish. So ya... Nervous to say the least!!

I had a daughter born with trisomy 13 I didn't know until I gave birth to her that she had it so it was a complete shock to everyone. She lived a month then passed away in my arms. Its now 3 years later since she passed I'm pregnant with another little girl I got a genetic test done called maternit21 all the testing came back negative & I was told I'm going to have a healthy baby girl. Even though she moves a lot more than my first && the test says she's healthy I still worry she could have something wrong.

I'm scared I'll have another miscarriage or something will go wrong. My fiance has two children already twins beautiful and healthy wroth his ex and she loves  to rub it in my face. She can be so unbelievably Crule to me. I just  want to make sure my baby is healthy and happy. In my family we have  difficult pregnancies. Mpst woman nearly site giving birth in my family so i know I'll have a difficult pregnancy.
Im terrified of having a miscarriage. Its my first pregnancy & Im only five weeks along.

I've seen a heartbeat and a year ago had miscarriage so now I'm just worried of missed miscarriage or my first born was early 32 weeks that happening again as well. I have difficult oregnancies so this one makes it through will be getting tubes tied I'm ten weeks on thyroid and blood pressure medicine and with first I developed diabetes so my doc believes I will have it again as well praying for a healthy baby

I've seen a heartbeat and a year ago had miscarriage so now I'm just worried of missed miscarriage or my first born was early 32 weeks that happening again as well. I have difficult oregnancies so this one makes it through will be getting tubes tied I'm ten weeks on thyroid and blood pressure medicine and with first I developed diabetes so my doc believes I will have it again as well praying for a healthy baby

I am 20 weeka now but I'm still scared of having a miscarriage. I had a miscarriage in September and it was the worst thing. My heart had never been so broken and I'm really scared it will happen again. Especially on days when she doesn't move as much

I had the fear that something may happen to my babies which resulted in a great deal of crying, stress, worrying, praying, only to lose my eyesight, have a alow birth weight baby girl in August of 2012 and she is beautiful, healthy, and not missing a beat. I had another baby girl November 2013, no stress....  she is beautiful and healthy and not my son is due. May 1, 2015...., Im was dilated to 2 on last Thursday and I see the doctor every week until he gets here.... He will be healthy as well if it be the Lords will. Just pray, eat healthy, don't worry because stress is a silent killer and hard on your bodies...worrying will not help you.

question: Pregnancy fears anyone. What are your fears throughout this pregnancy.
title: Pregnancy fears.
